name: places/ChIJgxwLl6hZwokRj3CL22eBaSw
formattedAddress: 11 W 30th St 5th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 11 W 30th St 5th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
Dear EPCC,

In response to your "Please remove your rating, you have never visited or been in contact with us at any time! Your 1 star is inappropriate and unfair." comment:

I certainly do not appreciate your insinuation. If you allow me, I would like to clarify the following. I did come all the way to your shop, which took me a few hours on public transports. I was very excited about getting to see your very nice products. Once I arrived, I had a terrible experience with the person I talked to via the interphone. This individual was very rude and offensive to me, to the point that I was still shocked by it weeks after it happened. After it happened, I simply left and was not aggressed physically or anything of that sort, but please understand that it was quite a traumatizing experience to go through, when I spent all this time to get there and back.

Now, it may be that this person may have been some kind of temporary worker at your shop, or have even pretended to work there, or some kind of strange scenario. In this case, I do believe your business should not be penalized for this person’s acts. Given that I don't know the exact nature of this relationship with you, please let me revise my review, which I'll set to the average number by other reviews. The main reason for that is that I want to support the nice work you do for the playing card community.

If this person turned out to be not related to your shop, I do apologize for my quick judgment. If they were indeed employed by you, I would strongly suggest that you look into their contacts with visitors.

Best regards,
OW

originalText.text:
I never cease to be amazed by the incredible craftsmanship, innovation, and dedication to the art of playing cards at Expert Playing Card Company.

From a simple one colored deck of cards, all the way to embossing and foil, EPCC does it all. Expertly.
